Class Searches

java.lang.Object
  su.Searches

public class Searches
extends java.lang.Object

This class searches through an int, double, string or object array to find and return back to the user

Author:
Glen Su Nov 11 2015

Method Detail

linearSearches

public static int linearSearches(int[] linearArray,
                                 int target)
This search method is used to search for an integer number in order from the beginning to the end within an integer array and returns the index of the array if the integer is found, otherwise a negative 1 will be returned

Parameters:
linearArray - - an array of ints
target - - the int value to search for
Returns:
- the index of the array or -1 if not found

binarySearches

public static int binarySearches(int[] binaryArray,
                                 int target)
This search method is used to search for an integer number by using the binary search method. It will return the index of the array if the target integer is found, otherwise a -1 will be returned.

Parameters:
binaryArray - - an array of ordered ints
target - - the int value to search for
Returns:
- the index of the array or -1 if not found

linearSearches

public static int linearSearches(java.util.ArrayList<ContestantInformation> contestants,
                                 ContestantInformation target)
This search method is used to search for a ContestantInformation object in order from the beginning to the end within a ContestantInformation arraylist and returns the index of the array if an object with the same information is found, otherwise a negative 1 will be returned.

Parameters:
contestants - - an arraylist of ContestantInformation objects
target - - the object to search for
Returns:
- the index of the arraylist or -1 if not found

binarySearches

public static int binarySearches(java.util.ArrayList<ContestantInformation> contestants,
                                 ContestantInformation target)
This search method is used to search for a ContestantInformation object by using the binary search method. It will return the index of the array if the target object with the same information is found, otherwise a -1 will be returned.

Parameters:
contestants - - an arraylist of ordered ContestantInformation objects
target - - the object to search for
Returns:
- the index of the arraylist or -1 if not found

linearSearches

public static int linearSearches(java.util.ArrayList<ContestantInformation> contestants,
                                 java.lang.String firstName,
                                 java.lang.String lastName)
This search method is used to search for a ContestantInformation object in order from the beginning to the end using the first and last names of a contestant within a ContestantInformation arraylist and returns the index of the array if an object with the same names is found, otherwise a negative 1 will be returned.

Parameters:
contestants - - an arraylist of ContestantInformation objects
firstName - - the first name of a contestant
lastName - - the last name of the same contestant
Returns:
- the index of the arraylist or -1 if not found

binarySearches

public static int binarySearches(java.util.ArrayList<ContestantInformation> contestants,
                                 java.lang.String firstName,
                                 java.lang.String lastName)
This search method is used to search for a ContestantInformation object through the first and last names of a contestant by using the binary search method. It will return the index of the array if the target object with the same information is found, otherwise a -1 will be returned.

Parameters:
contestants - - an arraylist of ordered ContestantInformation objects
firstName - - the first name of a contestant
lastName - - the last name of the same contestant
Returns:
- the index of the arraylist or -1 if not found

binarySearch

public static int binarySearch(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> arrayList,
                               java.lang.String target)
This helper method is used to search for a string by using a recursive search method. It will return the index of the array if the target string is found, otherwise a -1 will be returned.

Parameters:
arrayList - - the arraylist to search from
target - - the string to search for
Returns:
- the index of the arraylist or -1 if not found
